Replies.Author: dante
Replies.Content:
Yeah, proper formatting takes a while, doesn’t it? I’m just glad the blog has some actual content flowing again.

I think I’ll use this article as reference when reviewing series…in the future.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content:
This is really great post. Man, why is everyone more awesome than me? I thought it was the media officer’s job to be awesome, and I’m failing my job. I need to come up with something awesome.

God, since I have so much time now, I really should make that VN I wanted to make. I always say I’ll do something and never do. I really should do something I say I’ll do.

I never learned anything about writing, but I kinda figured it out myself, I think. I still need to actually learn the stuff, but I think I have nice concepts of settings, characters, and plot for an armature work, since I was working on it since I was, like, 5.

So if I ever do make one, you will be the music guy, Chris, since you seem to have a musical talent.

That should make me a little bit more awesome, I guess, and not fail as a media officer.

Replies.Author: Chris
Replies.Content:
Like yeah, I remember seeing that you wanted to watch Steins;Gate in your top 11 last year, and literally everyone’s seen it but you. Like, come on man. STOP FAILING

Nah, I’m just giving you shit. Yeah, if you ever work on that VN, I’d love to see it. Writing is just a practice thing, so the more you write, the better you get. And you could just record yourself doing awesome stuff on a computer. Like those weird Chinese porn game things you play with little girls shooting each other. Yeah.

Replies.Author: Kevin L
Replies.Content: This is some pretty deep stuff, but makes so much sense. Thanks for the enlightenment.

Replies.Author: Steve W
Replies.Content:
God dammit, why does Chris get all the good posts ( [http://minesblog.com/anime/2011/05/25/enjoying-anime-how-the-does-that-work/](http://minesblog.com/anime/2011/05/25/enjoying-anime-how-the-does-that-work/)).

Great post, I think you hit the nail on the head. I do agree that most one-season anime tend to feel rushed. I tend to like stories that take their time to completely flesh out their universe. It just feels more… complete. That being said, 3 of my top 5 anime are twelve(ish) episodes (GRZ, Madoka, Bakemonogatari).

Enjoyed the read, can’t wait till your next one.

Replies.Author: Daniel
Replies.Content:
Ah come on, I bet there’s someone out there who could do 30 credit hours in a semester.

Anyway, I think that what you’re saying makes sense. You should give this link to all the anime writers that are writing for 12 episode series, and maybe you’ll save anime!

Oh, and I agree with Chaeha, you seem to have a talent for music. Chaeha will do writing, I’ll do game design stuff, you can do music, now we need a voice actor and someone who can draw.
